SiegeEngineType.name: {=pa3E7810}Siege Preparations
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Fill in ditches, level the terrain and set up aracher positions in preparation of the assault.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=G0AWk1rX}Ladder
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Ladders are simple and quick to produce but offer no protection for the assailants.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=xaHELVnx}Siege Tower
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Siege towers allow approaching the walls without being exposed to missiles, and reduce the defender's height advantage.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=*}Advanced Siege Tower
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}A Siege tower that is sturdier and has a platform for archers.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=abbALYlp}Ballista
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Ballistas are effective against enemy ranged weapons. They can also pick up individual enemies at range.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=NeWvHjCw}Fire Ballista
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Fire ballistas are similar to regular ballistas but fire burning projectiles which are more effective against siege engines.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=Ew11a1Tx}Catapult
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Catapults are effective against enemy siege engines as well as walls.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=Wg2P3acK}Fire Catapult
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Fire catapults are similar to regular ones but fire incendiary projectiles which are more effective against siege engines

SiegeEngineType.name: {=GPESFoWD}Onager
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Onagers are effective against enemy siege engines as well as walls.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=iLD5Lkto}Fire Onager
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Fire Onagers are effective against enemy siege engines as well as walls and hurl incendiary projectiles.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=TlP31w8l}Bricole
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Bricoles are powerful siege weapons that can be placed on towers.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=4Skg9QhO}Trebuchet
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Trebuchets take time to build and set up but given enough time, will turn enemy defenses to rubble.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=*}Fire Trebuchet
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}Fire trebuchets hurl incendiary projectiles instead of regular stones which are more effective against enemy siege weapons and personell.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=MaBSSg7I}Battering Ram
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}A battering ram can be used to break the gate and open access to the inner courtyard.

SiegeEngineType.name: {=zt0bVSsU}Improved Ram
SiegeEngineType.description: {=*}A more powerful version of the regular battering ram.
